description: A coin engraved with the challenger's name. It symbolizes honor and strength for dueling clubs.

description: Perfume with amber smell, Mixed with liquorice and immortelle fragrance, After use, the body will be surrounded by fumes, Just like dust floating at sunny noon.

name: Amethyst
description: A gem with a mysterious purple glow. Being a very rare item, it can be used as equipment or to make high-end headwear.
